verificationCode.title: Verification
verificationCode.label_1: Enter the verification code which you have received on your email
verificationCode.label_3: Didn't received the verification code ? ( please check your spam folder ), and check that your email address is correct
verificationCode.subject: Socializus - verification code -
verificationCode.message: You received this message because you try to change your password on socializus. Please put this code ###### on the app in order to change to your password
verificationCode.EmailConfirmation: Hi! if you want to create events in the app, you will need to confirm your email but if you prefer now to go faster it will be possible to do it later
verificationCode.messageRoleChange: Hi! Please put this code ###### on the app in order to verify your email
verificationCode.t2022_reLoginMessage: Your email is now verified! Please log in again to update your account
verificationCode.incorrectCode:
Code incorrect or expired

createProfile.title: Create Profile
createProfile.ErrorFirstName: Your first name cannot contain special characters.
createProfile.ErrorlastName: Your last name cannot contain special characters.
createProfile.secretName: Your last name is secret, no worries ðŸ˜‰ it will be usefull for additionnal features
createProfile.nickNametext: Your nickname is unique so no one else will be able to use the same nickname. If you are a brand or a bar please update this now !
createProfile.fakeUser: We do not want fake user, please add a picture to your profil to use this app
createProfile.nickNameError: Your use name will be abbreviated to your activity icon ðŸ˜‰
createProfile.imageSizeError: Your image exceeds the maximum size. Don't forget we are a non-profit organisation but we will improve the app. Crop your image with our tool to use less memory.
createProfile.cityMessage: Choose your city from the list

concept.title: Friendly meeting app
concept.aboutDescription: The first friendly meeting app to help internationals and organizers find each other and share activities in their city of residence. Everything will be soon geolocated and shared with maps and mobile notifications so you don't forget anything.

concept.title: Organize or share activities
concept.aboutDescription: An evening at home, a picnic, a sports session, a cinema, a visit to a museum, a cultural trip, a concert, a meal, ... there are many themes to create and share your activities with SOCIALIZUS. New features to invite friends, meet and interact with comments coming soon.

concept.title: Socialize with internationals
concept.aboutDescription: Meet new friends, having fun and talking to everyone, about everything, and in all languages, it's always easier with an application that translates everything automatically. The language barrier no longer exists, it's time to get together to enjoy an unforgettable social life

modal_Image.modal_message: Add an illustration about your activity
modal_Image.find_message: Find a picture for your activity
modal_Image.text_unsplash: Find the perfect picture to illustrate your activity and attract more people thanks to Unsplash.
modal_Image.sugest_unsplash: (Or go back to upload your own picture)

contact.title: Contact us
contact.label_1: In case of difficulty to connect you can contact us with a Whatsapp group or by phone
contact.label_2: Different WhatsApp groups are available according to your needs:
contact.label_3: The phone number to contact us is a toll number:
contact.label_4: It's a service that allows us to have a redirection on all the phones of people who can help you between 10 a.m. and 6 p.m. It's also a way to make a donation for the association because it's a premium number.

step1.theOnly: (The only map without restrictions for organizers)
step1.b2022_coOrganizerRequestEarly: Come 5 minutes earlier to the activity

step2.addressError: You must enter an address or select a point on the map
step2.datetimeError: You must select a date and time
step2.pricelinkError: The ticket sale link must start with 'http://' or 'https://'

step3.label: Continue Creating an Activity :
step3.inOrder: In order to increase interest for your activities, we suggest you to customise your event with a cover picture but you will get an automatic picture illustration according to your topic in case you need one
step3.please: Please explain your activity a bit more:

step4.b2022_phoneNumberVisible: Phone number visible for attendees only
step4.descriptionError: you must select write a description
step4.howToFindError: you must explain how to find

activity.CopyPaste: Copy & Paste to create your own activity
activity.t2022_NotificationGroupChat: Allow notifications in this chat group
activity.t2022_Information: You can help this event's organizer or make your own event. Let's socialize!
activity.t2022_contactOrga: Contact our Socializus team on Whatsapp to become an organizer

b2022_news.nonProfit: A non-profit association helping internationals to meet, and to organize and share events.
b2022_news.activeUsers: 27000 active users (and counting!) eager to chat and meet each other
b2022_news.freeApp: A free app to help you socialize and make new friends through free or paid activities
b2022_news.helpTheApp: We need your help to improve the app! Spread the word, add friends to our FB group or become an organizer.
